answerText: Republic of Finland [or Suomi; Suomen tasavalta; or Republiken Finland][10] This blacksmith, a character in the Kalevala, created a mill that could synthesize gold out of thin air called the Sampo.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 7 | 3 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer some questions about a national epic compiled by Elias Lonnrot, the Kalevala, for 10 points each: [10] The Kalevala, which includes an episode in which Lemminkainen is resurrected with the help of his mother, is the national epic of this nation. Its protagonists also include Vanamoinen and Kullervo.
